description: Revexo Brings the Unique Range of Place Mats. Upgrade the look of your Table with this amazing designs and printed placemats. Set of 6 pc of placemats. Add A Dash of Sophistication To The Room And To The Tables with Revexo Table Placemats And Make An Instant Impact Inside The Room. The Intricate Designs on These Table Mats Are Sure to Grab the Attention of visitors. Placemats have a good strength and are water resistant and this will bring a contemporary charm on your dining table.
